title: What Are the Stages of the Design Process?
description: Understand the simple steps designers follow to turn ideas into usable solutions.

words.fact: Strong design starts with discovery. Why it matters: skipping research leads to wrong solutions. Today's takeaway: learn before you design.
Clear problems lead to better solutions. Why it matters: vague goals waste time. Today's takeaway: define the problem before solving it.
Exploring many ideas increases quality. Why it matters: first ideas are rarely the best. Today's takeaway: quantity fuels creativity.
Prototypes make ideas testable. Why it matters: early feedback prevents costly changes. Today's takeaway: build to learn, not to finish.
Testing reveals real user behavior. Why it matters: assumptions often fail. Today's takeaway: feedback improves designs before launch.
